name: PB Ghosties
author: DEVINT
summary: Perfect for Halloween snacking, these slightly soft, not-too-sweet, and ghoulishly good little cut-out crackers are smeared with natural peanut butter for a fun after school snack or wholesome Halloween party refreshment. Form into sandwiches or leave as individuals. Enjoy your spooky snack! Booooooooooooo!
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Whisk flour and baking soda together in a bowl
Beat margarine and sugar together in a separate bowl using an electric mixer until smooth and creamy; beat in egg until evenly combined
Stir flour mixture into margarine mixture until dough is just combined; stir in vinegar
Turn dough onto a floured surface and roll into an 1/8-inch thick rectangle
Cut dough into ghost shapes using the cookie cutter
Arrange ghosts on the prepared baking sheet
Prick holes into each ghost using a clean pin
Bake in the preheated oven until crackers are golden brown, 6 to 10 minutes
Spread peanut butter onto cooled crackers
